requirements.requirement: Ability to full manage suppliers while still agnostic to Block
requirements.details: Assigning vendors capabilities, tracking DOA rates, etc for Block Imaging
requirements.new_functionality: Yes/No (currently exists in Block system, needs to integrate into new system)

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to have multiple 'capabilities'
requirements.details: These are buckets we put them in to route requests to

requirements.requirement: Must be able to rank each vendor within a capability with a tier
requirements.details: Tiers 1-3 (+) based on vendor KPI

requirements.requirement: Must be able to manage Customer Concession Vendors
requirements.details: If not approved, or actively listed as customer concession by Block, teams need to still have visablity into capabilities

requirements.requirement: Must be able to record vendor warehouse locations and shipping cut off times on Vendor Account
requirements.details: There may be multiple, differing, options per supplier

requirements.requirement: On Capability record, we must be able to include 'notes' visable to internal (Block) users only
Ability for vendors to be connected to multiple customers
Must be able to have multiple users under 1 account
User must be able to see who is logged in from homepage
Homepage must default to Open Requests
requirements.details: Requests that have not yet been responded to

requirements.requirement: Requests must order by oldest on top
Requests (SRCs) must display with Time Open, SRC #, Requesting Customer, Material, Qty Requested and any notes customer put in at time of submission
When responding from homepage view, user must be able to press 'unavailable' button without drilling into SRC
From homepage view, Vendor must be able to view their connected customers
From homepage view, vendor must be able to see Roll up of Pending Fulfillments
From homepage view, vendor must be able to see Pending Fulfilments, Request History and Order History
Vendor must be able to 'search' each list view (Open Requests, Pending Fulfillments, Request History, Order History)

Pending Fulfillments tab must display  PO#, Customer, Item Description, Total, Age Open (measured by time passed since PO record was created, until PO record confirmed), Confirmed. Button to click in to to view Purchase Records, or hyperlink PO#

Request History View: Tiem Open (shows vendor response time), Sourcing Item #, Customer Name, Item Description, Qty, Status / Disposition (rename disposition 'condition'), Pricing (EX/OR). Ability to click into SRC to view record (or add'l button to click into to view).
Vendor must see SRC#, Item Description, Customer Name, Created Date, Requested Qty adn Request Notes (what customer entered at time of request)

requirements.phase: Phase 1 - Buttons or reply to the email
requirements.requirement: Vendor to be able to respond from email without logging into portal
requirements.details: Ex: Virtus Imaging

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to click 'no stock button'
requirements.details: This should automatically update the status to 'No stock' and close the record out, taking vendor to homepage

requirements.requirement: Buttons at bottom of SRC: Submit Quote, Clone, No Stock
To submit quote, vendor must enter Exchange Price, Outright Price, Condition, Warranty Period, Warranty Type
Optional fields on SRC: Alternative Part Number, Date of Manufacturer, Item Usage.
Quantity' field on SRC should default to 1, and be renamed to 'Qty available'
New Check Box: 'This Item is on Backorder'
requirements.details: If vendor selects this, it must be visable to customer in SWP / Block Imaging as it means this is NOT in stock

requirements.requirement: If vendor Submits Quote, it keeps them on SRC record with a 'submitted' notification and allows them to clone it for a second option (third, 4th)
requirements.details: Developers: Please propose alt. way of user offering multiple options for one material
requirements.new_functionality: Yes/No (currently exists in Block system, needs to integrate into new system)

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to view all connected cloned options in their history
Vendor must be able to view customer user on the EMA and send messages, files, photos, etc
requirements.details: EMA = Messsage app
requirements.new_functionality: Yes/No (currently exists in Block system, needs to integrate into new system)

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to click into order from 'Pending Fulfilments' view and from link in email
Vendor must see same view as customer here: Recap of purchase fields (Customer Name, PO#, Issued Date, Total USE
Vendor must be able to click 'Confirm Order' Button
requirements.details: Launches email notification to customer that order is en process, stops timer

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to enter tracking, Serial Number, RMA number
requirements.details: When submitted, customer gest email w/notification

requirements.requirement: Vendor must be able to save all or one of the fields above. Notification only fires to customer when all 3 fields are entered
Vendor must be able to send and receive messages on sourcing record (notifications firing for each)
Vendor must be able to send/recieve notifications on order record
requirements.details: notifications firing for each

requirements.requirement: Once a sourcing record has been purchased, vendor may still use EMA on that record but guided to PO record if messages are related to order itself
Vendor must receive a notification to the email (on the capability) for a new request
Vendor must receive a notification via email for a PO
Vendor must receive a notificaiton via email for a chatter (EMA)
Vendor must have ability to click into link on every email notification to be taken directly to that record
Vendor must be able to receive orders for warranty replacement from customers
requirements.details: Vendor must KNOW it's a warranty, know why, and be prompted to provide warranty RMA

requirements.requirement: FAQ tab on SW Homepage
requirements.details: A place where venders can access training videos, tips and tricks, release updates, etc

requirements.requirement: Vendors should be able to view their shipping cut offs from portal view in SW
requirements.details: On home page, so they can request edits as neede
requirements.new_functionality: Yes/No (currently exists in Block system, needs to integrate into new system)

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to view all req items that are connected to a single Req
requirements.details: This helps them understand bulk sales opportunities, hero kits, etc

requirements.requirement: Legal agreements for buyers / vendors (some sort of T's&C's for using the portal)
requirements.details: Not a dev. requirement*

requirements.requirement: Vendor should be able to Cancel a PO if they can no longer fulfil it
requirements.details: This would auto-close stages & status to 'Cancelled' and must issue notification to customer that order was cancelled.

requirements.requirement: If vendor does not response to an SRC within 7 days, the record should automatically move to history as a 'No Response' status (ie: removed from homepage, timer stops)
Ability for Vendor to Export Views / Data from portal
Ability for internal Block teams to propose new suppliers
requirements.details: This would trigger Vendor Quality team + SW team to vet and onboard new supplies

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to upload / view their Terms and Conditions
requirements.details: At the very least this should live on account in Block SF

requirements.requirement: Ability for vendors to view their approval status in SW
requirements.details: Auto alert from Sourcing Window when they are about to expire, and ability to fill out form and submit to re-new.

requirements.requirement: Any connection to Legendary - and fully agnostic to Block's SF org
In SW, There will not be an editable 'status'
In SW, there will not be a 'cancel' button
in SW, there will not be a 'save' button
